title: Playmode dropdown gets out of sync with current playmode

content.raw:
When the game starts automatically 5 seconds after a player is connected, the current playmode switches to `KickOffLeft`, but the dropdown box stays at `BeforeKickOff`.

![](http://i.imgur.com/TNcArfu.png)

This then makes it impossible to switch to `BeforeKickOff` again before first switching to another playmode, because the dropdown's presumably only triggers when the current selection actually changed.
